hero.title: Our Communities
hero.subtitle: Discover vibrant intergenerational connections in your area
hero.description: Join one of our thriving community chapters where people of all ages come together to share, learn, and grow.

communities.name: Riverside Chapter
communities.description: Our flagship chapter brings together seniors and young families for storytelling, skill-sharing, and community projects.

communities.name: Downtown Hub
communities.description: An evening chapter perfect for working professionals and retirees to connect over shared interests and experiences.

communities.name: Eastside Connections
communities.description: A bilingual chapter serving our diverse Eastside community with culturally rich programming.

steps.title: Choose Your Chapter
steps.description: Find the community chapter that works best for your schedule and location.

steps.title: Attend a Meeting
steps.description: Drop by any regular meeting - no appointment necessary! We welcome newcomers warmly.

steps.title: Get Involved
steps.description: Participate in activities, share your skills, and help us build stronger intergenerational bonds.

startChapter.title: Start a New Chapter
startChapter.description: Interested in bringing Oasis & Mirage to your community? We provide training, resources, and ongoing support to help you launch a successful chapter.
requirements: Commitment to our mission and values
Ability to secure a regular meeting space
Willingness to complete our facilitator training
